Class FoodItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • FoodItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<FoodItem>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fruit, Meat, Preserve, Vegetable
    public class FoodItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<FoodItem>
    Class to represent a food product that can be stored in an Inventory.
    Author:
    Isaac Ribeiro, James Mwangi Student Number: 040957075 Course: CST8130 - Data Structures Professor: James Mwangi PhD. CET-CS-Level 3
